name: Turbo City Golf Club
description:
Your tired of golfing in the same green ? On the same holes ? With the same boring peoples ? Join the Turbo City Golf Club for a new adventure in your city !

Your journey begind now ! Be the first to score by all means ! F*ck pedestrian, f*ck car, f*uck windows ! Collateral damages are not your problems ! 

Use your abilities, grab bonuses, use vehicles and more !

The only thing that matters is to BE - THE - FIRST !

PS : As a WIP made solo in 72h of Game Jam, many features are unfortunately not yet available.
